an6.16:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
an6.16:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena nakulapitā gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
an6.16:4.3: Atha kho nakulamātā gahapatānī nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
an6.16:5.1: “Mā kho tvaṃ, gahapati, sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:5.4: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:5.5: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena sakkhissati dārake posetuṃ, gharāvāsaṃ santharitun’ti.
an6.16:5.6: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:5.7: Kusalāhaṃ, gahapati, kappāsaṃ kantituṃ veṇiṃ olikhituṃ.
an6.16:5.8: Sakkomahaṃ, gahapati, tavaccayena dārake posetuṃ, gharāvāsaṃ santharituṃ.
an6.16:5.9: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:5.11: garahitā ca bhagavatā sāpekkhassa kālakiriyā. (1)
an6.16:6.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:6.2: ‘nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena aññaṃ gharaṃ gamissatī’ti.
an6.16:6.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:6.4: Tvañceva kho, gahapati, jānāsi ahañca, yaṃ no soḷasavassāni gahaṭṭhakaṃ brahmacariyaṃ samāciṇṇaṃ.
an6.16:6.5: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:6.7: garahitā ca bhagavatā sāpekkhassa kālakiriyā. (2)
an6.16:7.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:7.2: ‘nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena na dassanakāmā bhavissati bhagavato na dassanakāmā bhikkhusaṅghassā’ti.
an6.16:7.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:7.4: Ahañhi, gahapati, tavaccayena dassanakāmatarā ceva bhavissāmi bhagavato, dassanakāmatarā ca bhikkhusaṅghassa.
an6.16:7.5: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:7.7: garahitā ca bhagavatā sāpekkhassa kālakiriyā. (3)
an6.16:8.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:8.2: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena sīlesu paripūrakārinī’ti.
an6.16:8.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:8.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā sīlesu paripūrakāriniyo, ahaṃ tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:8.5: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—
an6.16:8.6: ayaṃ so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye—
an6.16:8.8: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:8.10: garahitā ca bhagavatā sāpekkhassa kālakiriyā. (4)
an6.16:9.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:9.2: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī lābhinī ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassā’ti.
an6.16:9.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:9.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā lābhiniyo ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, ahaṃ tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:9.5: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—
an6.16:9.6: ayaṃ so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye—
an6.16:9.8: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:9.10: garahitā ca bhagavatā sāpekkhassa kālakiriyā. (5)
an6.16:10.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:10.2: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane viharatī’ti.
an6.16:10.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:10.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane viharanti, ahaṃ tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:10.5: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—
an6.16:10.6: ayaṃ so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye—
an6.16:10.8: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:10.10: garahitā ca bhagavatā sāpekkhassa kālakiriyā”ti. (6)
an6.16:11.1: Atha kho nakulapituno gahapatissa nakulamātarā gahapatāniyā iminā ovādena ovadiyamānassa so ābādho ṭhānaso paṭippassambhi.
an6.16:11.2: Vuṭṭhahi ca nakulapitā gahapati tamhā ābādhā;
an6.16:11.3: tathā pahīno ca pana nakulapituno gahapatissa so ābādho ahosi.
an6.16:11.4: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā daṇḍamolubbha yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.16:11.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.16:12.2: Yassa te nakulamātā gahapatānī anukampikā atthakāmā ovādikā anusāsikā.
an6.16:12.3: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā sīlesu paripūrakāriniyo, nakulamātā gahapatānī tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:12.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā lābhiniyo ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, nakulamātā gahapatānī tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:12.5: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane viharanti, nakulamātā gahapatānī tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:12.6: Lābhā te, gahapati, suladdhaṃ te, gahapati.
an6.16:12.7: Yassa te nakulamātā gahapatānī anukampikā atthakāmā ovādikā anusāsikā”ti.
